text: Nba, n yi sube magaxuxina13.1 Sube magaxuxin findixi yamanan manga gbeen sɛnbɛn misaala ra na waxatini. Yamanan manga gbeen yi dɛnkɛlɛya muxune ɲaxankatama. A mɔn findɛ to dunuɲa mangane sɛnbɛ ɲaxin misaala ra. nde to tɛ fɔxɔ igen xɔrɛ ra, xun solofere, feri fu a ma. Mangaya kɔmɔti taxamasenne soxi a feri fune ra, Ala rayelefu xinla nde sɛbɛxi a xunne birin ma.
